# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please **DO NOT** open a public issue.

Instead, please email the security issue to the repository maintainer privately.

### What to Include

- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

### Response Time

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for fixes.

### Disclosure Policy

- Vulnerabilities will be disclosed after a fix is available
- Credit will be given to the reporter (unless they prefer anonymity)
